ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] RoK (was: Digest Number 87)
ygData.msgSnippet: They said those who had ordered before the cut-off date (I forget just what date that was since I orderd my RoK much later) and who hadn t received it by the
ygData.messageBody:
They said those who had ordered before the cut-off date (I forget just
what date that was since I orderd my RoK much later) and who hadn't
received it by the 24th when they "opened" Kunark would get a free
month on their account. I believe they also stated they would not
charge shipping. None of this gets your game to you any quicker, but
at least they're not saying "tough, deal with it". :o/ It should all
be in the EQNews log somewhere.

Good luck!

Lori

On Wed, 26 Apr 2000 06:34:14 -0700, you wrote:

>I haven't gotten mine yet either ... and I wonder if I am going to get it
>or if they are just refunding our money... bah-hunbug
